text: Pierre River or Rivière Pierre may refer to: * Pierre River (Brébeuf Lake), a tributary of Brébeuf Lake in Le Fjord-du-Saguenay Regional County Municipality, Quebec, Canada * Pierre River (Mitchinamecus River tributary), in the unorganized territory of Baie-Obaoca, Quebec, Canada ==See also== * Rivière-à-Pierre (disambiguation) * Jean-Pierre River * Pierre-Paul River * Saint Pierre River (disambiguation)
title: Pierre River
